  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    XStreamBuilder
    addAllClassesInSamePackageAs(Class<?> type)
    Uses the Package of the given argument to call addPackage(Package).
    protected XStreamBuilder
    addDefaultPermissions()
    Adds the following XStream TypePermissions as sensible defaults: NoTypePermission.NONE NullPermission.NULL PrimitiveTypePermission.PRIMITIVES Creates a TypeHierarchyPermission for all implementations of the Collection.class Note that NoTypePermission.NONE is added first which will clear out all existing permissions.
    XStreamBuilder

      Returns:

    • addPackage

      public XStreamBuilder addPackage(Package p)
      Adds a Java package whose name will be used to construct a glob expression matching all contained classes. This expression will be added to the list of those evaluated when the build() method is called to white list XStream targets.
      Parameters:
      p - Java java.lang.Package
      Returns:
      XStreamBuilder instance

      Returns:

      fieldName - name of the field
      itemType - Class of the field's contents
      Returns:
      XStreamBuilder

    • addDefaultPermissions

      protected XStreamBuilder addDefaultPermissions()
      Adds the following XStream TypePermissions as sensible defaults:
      • NoTypePermission.NONE
      • NullPermission.NULL
      • PrimitiveTypePermission.PRIMITIVES
      • Creates a TypeHierarchyPermission for all implementations of the Collection.class
      Note that NoTypePermission.NONE is added first which will clear out all existing permissions. Logic is inspired by on this example on the XStream site.
      Returns:
      XStreamBuilder
